name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, ActualTaunt, aquamuffin, nutmeg, Nictusempra)

name: alejandroadam
text: A comment left by alejandroadam was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, Badganjil, Teira, equinn2006, ActualTaunt, Nictusempra)

name: rowboat
text: And if you watch too much, nothing will ever be funny again. You'll be a very bitter man.

name: snowman
text: I don't watch Emeril at all, I just found this one funny because, like...why would it be at all fun for Philippe to look like Emeril?

name: knuckleheadbabylon
text: Phillipe kind of looks more like Abe Vigoda to me.

name: mustakrakesh
text: One hella chubby for this comment.

name: william
text: I like how gigantic the package is considering it only contains two adhesive strips of hair. Or maybe there are hundreds of Emeril eyebrows in there and Phillipe could put them on inanimate objects like in the googly eyes guest strip

name: rotating-dog
text: Emeril's trademarked shit eating grin on the box makes this strip.

name: rowboat
text: All "What? Ya wanna look like little ol' me ?"

name: cousinted
text: Philippe looks Eye-Talian

name: godfatherofsouls
text: LOOK LIKE EMERIL

name: simon_wolf
text: Emeril jokes just haven't held up as well as you would expect.

name: sporkism
text: emeril has some pretty good sauce. and the eyebrows are quite formidable.

name: hypoluxa
text: I've got to agree with the alt text on this one.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Heh, the final strip in my random journey through the archives. Ah, Achewood, inscrutable to the last.

name: mirzabah
text: I think Philippe looks like a tiny, incongruously happy Brezhnev.

name: farqussus
text: I don't know who Emeril is, but the box picture makes him look like he lives in a wheelchair controlled by a tube into which he breathes.

name: charchar
text: somewhere there is an Emeril farm, where the Emerils are raised and then brutally slaughtered for their magnificent eyebrows.

name: woodenteeth
text:
...and that's why the box is so big, you kinda have to tear the 'brows off the face inside**.

**scalpel not included.

name: unsentletter
text:
Where's the dude with the Fooly Cooly eyebrows icon?

It has similar impact...

name: plasticthings
text: I always want to find this in the "as seen on TV" store

name: professorriffs
text: I was gonna give it a 4 but after reading the alt text I gotta go five.  He's right, I just can't say that this is a bad idea.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Those are the creepiest god damn eyebrows an otter could wear.

name: ssddr
text: Emeril's body actually has a fantastic property in that any time a camera is pointed at him, he will make the smugest expression known to man, evidenced by this box.

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh damn you're right.

name: genequagmire
text: That's a bad idea.

name: echasketch
text: Ain't nothin lil' about that man. Know what I'm sayin? heh heh?

name: random_shorts
text: Instructions on box: Apply above THESE EYES.
